contents:
在晚星坠落彷徨午夜，迷雾里最远处吹来号角声：“捍自由，来齐集这里，来权力抗对，勇气智慧也永不灭。”

长期抗争者可考虑寻找一些渠道申请资助：
National Endowment for Democracy:（需以组织身份申请） https://www.ned.org/apply-for-grant/en/
Freedom House: https://freedomhouse.org/programs/emergency-assistance-and-thematic-programs
Free Press Unlimited:（资助媒体专项资金） Reporters Respond: emergency funding for the media
The Sparkplug Foundation:  https://www.sparkplugfoundation.org/content/sparkplug-emergency-funding
